title: Pete's Frootique
description: Local grocery store that sells local produce and other local goods. Carries a good selection of vegan specialty items such as Daiya cheese, Tofutti products and cruelty free beauty and household supplies. Also has a juice bar and sushi bar with vegan options. A pizza place as well with one vegan pizza listed on the menu (Roasted Rocket) or you can order your own pizza with desired toppings.
